name: nin-ghosts-i-iv
description: In March 2008, [Nine Inch Nails released the album Ghosts I-IV](https://wiki.creativecommons.org/wiki/case_Studies/Nine_Inch_Nails_Ghosts_I-IV) under a [Creative Commons BY-NC-SA](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/us/) licence. This module provides a playlist, audio files, and liner notes for the album.
